class_notes: Pre-requisites of BIOS 500 AND EPI 530 or EPI 504. Course meets during the first half  of the semester.  This is a 7 Week 1 Session Course.  Please see RSPH Academic Calendar for condensed A/D/S and Grading Status Change Deadlines.
course_description: Various topics by Epi faculty. Current topics include Prediction Research, Epidemiology of Respiratory Illness, and Infectious Disease Dynamics.
sections: Class Nbr: 3313, Section #: 3, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10-11:50a, Instructor: Janssens/Gwinn, Status: Open
